name: AWS Security Hub
description: This app integrates with AWS Security Hub to ingest findings

poll_now_days.description: Poll last 'n' days for POLL NOW

scheduled_poll_days.description: Poll last 'n' days for scheduled polling

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration

actions.verbose:
This app supports two possible methods for ingesting findings:
  • Directly from Security Hub - To use this method, leave the sqs_url asset configuration field blank.
  • Via an SQS Queue - To use this method, add the URL of an SQS queue to the sqs_url asset configuration field. This method will ignore the poll_now_days and scheduled_poll_days asset configuration parameters. Messages will be deleted from the queue after being received.

container_id.description: Container IDs to limit the ingestion to

start_time.description: Start of the time range, in epoch time (milliseconds)

end_time.description: End of the time range, in epoch time (milliseconds)

container_count.description: Maximum number of container records to query for

artifact_count.description: Maximum number of artifact records to query for

actions.description: Lists and describes Security Hub aggregated findings that are specified by a single filter attribute
actions.verbose: If none of the filter parameters are provided, all the findings will be fetched controlled by the limit parameter. For the parameters resource_ec2_ipv4_addresses and network_source_ipv4, if the user provides comma-separated values and one or more values are incorrect, then those values will be simply ignored and only correct values will be used for further filtering of the findings.

resource_id.description: The canonical identifier for the given resource type

resource_ec2_ipv4_addresses.description: Comma-separated IPv4 addresses associated with the instance

network_source_ipv4.description: Comma-separated source IPv4 addresses of network-related information about a finding
contains: aws security hub network source ip

network_source_mac.description: The source media access control (MAC) address of network-related information about a finding

resource_region.description: The canonical AWS external region name where this resource is located

limit.description: Maximum number of findings to be fetched

is_archived.description: Flag to fetch the archived findings

contains: aws security hub network source ip

example_values: EC2 instance has an unprotected port which is being probed by a known malicious host

contains: aws security hub network source ip

example_values: Unprotected port on EC2 instance i-123456abcdefhgf is being probed

actions.description: Lists Security Hub aggregated findings that are specified by filter attributes

example_values: EC2 instance has an unprotected port which is being probed by a known malicious host

contains: aws security hub network source ip

example_values:
(test test - 2019-06-20 09:41:25) test overwrite false

(test test - 2019-06-20 09:40:46) true
Unprotected port on EC2 instance i-123456abcdef1234abcd is being probed

actions.description: Archive the AWS Security Hub aggregated findings specified by the filter attributes

overwrite.description: Check this box to overwrite the existing notes, otherwise notes will be appended to existing notes

example_values: Note is not added as it is not provided in the input parameters of the action

actions.description: Unarchive the AWS Security Hub aggregated findings specified by the filter attributes

overwrite.description: Check this box to overwrite the existing notes, otherwise notes will be appended to existing notes

example_values: Note is not added as it is not provided in the input parameters of the action

actions.description: Add Note to the AWS Security Hub aggregated findings specified by the filter attributes

overwrite.description: Check this box to overwrite the existing notes, otherwise notes will be appended to existing notes

example_values: Note added successfully to the provided findings ID
